issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
Initially reported as no image loads, the image will load in some cases with a long delay. This does not seem related to network capability.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS on device
2) Navigate to Platform > XHR > Binary Data

Result:
Long delay (7 + seconds) or timeout and no image loaded.

Expected:
Small image loads in under 2 seconds
fields.summary: Android: Binary data: v8 only: Long delay or connection timeout and no image loaded
fields.environment: SDK 1.8.0 8911fc4, Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.7.201111061615, Nexus S (2.3.6), Galaxy 10.1 Tab (3.1) v8 compiler

comments.body: No longer able to reproduce with SDK 1.8.0.1.v20111123202050 on either Nexus S with v8 or Galaxy Tab 10.1 with v8. Closing.
